title: Experience-Driven Self-Directed Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Theories and Experimental Methodologies
context.additional_context: Building cloud-based experiential learning systems utilizing learners' personal digital devices. Emphasizes knowledge sharing and collaborative learning through online social networks

learning_goals: Learners can design self-directed learning pathways using digital platforms to solve real-world problems in scientific fields.
Learners can expand existing knowledge and generate new scientific knowledge by utilizing cloud-based intellectual repositories
Learners can share knowledge with peers through online collaborative tools and enhance digital literacy and empathy skills
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
